Title: Establishes a cause of action for damages against a person who attempts or performs a sex selective abortion
Summary: Establishes a cause of action for damages against a person who attempts or performs a sex selective abortion.
LawCode: Add ยง230-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing a cause of action for damages against a person who attempts or performs a sex selective abortion
